markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Winding Flow](/Feats.aspx?ID=6023) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

</column>

---

Any journey consists of more than simply reaching your destination. You use two of the following actions in any order: Stand, Step, and Stride. You can't use the same action twice.
name: Winding Flow
